src:
Arsenal Mengkhawatirkan, Bakal Dihajar Leicester City?
07 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal dikhawatirkan bakal menerima pukulan berat ketika menyambangi Leicester City, Minggu (10/11/2019) mendatang. Melihat kondisi kedua tim sekarang, tampaknya mustahil Arsenal pulang dalam kondisi baik-baik saja.
Di bawah Brendan Rodgers, Leicester merupakan salah satu tim paling mengejutkan di Premier League musim ini. Terbukti, saat ini Leicester ada di peringkat ke-3 klasemen sementara.
Jamie Vardy dkk. bisa jadi batu sandungan tim-tim besar, Liverpool saja perlu keberuntungan untuk mengalahkan Leicester. Sebab itu, dengan kekuatan Arsenal yang sekarang, tampaknya sulit membayangkan hasil selain kekalahan untuk The Gunners.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Arsenal Worrying, Will Be Beaten by Leicester City?
Nov 7 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Bola.net - It is feared Arsenal will receive a heavy blow when visited Leicester City on Sunday (11/10/2019) future. Looking at the condition of the two teams now, it seems impossible that Arsenal return home in fine condition.
Under Brendan Rodgers, Leicester are one of the most shocking teams in the Premier League this season. Evidently, Leicester is currently ranked 3rd in the standings.
Jamie Vardy et al. could be a stumbling block for big teams, Liverpool just need luck to beat Leicester. Therefore, with Arsenal's current strength, it seems difficult to imagine results other than defeat for the Gunners.

Read below, Bolaneters!
